judicialResults.resultText:
RI - Remanded in custody
Remanded in custody until hearing on 17/02/2025 at 10:00 in Courtroom 01, Lavender Hill Magistrates' Court. Basis: Remanded for a medical report by a single medical practitioner. Adjournment reason: To attend or a warrant to issue. Bail exceptions: Defendant charged with murder. Reason for applying: Offended on bail.
